img.alt: Mission - Toledo Public Schools' mission is to produce competitive college and career ready graduates through a rigorous surriculum across all grade levels by implementing Ohio's New Learning Standards with fidelity.
Vision - Toledo Public Schools strives to be an 'A-rated' school district whose graduates are college and career ready.
Core Commitments - Student-Centered, Accountability-Based Management, Building Stronger Relationships, Technology Oriented, Rigorous Curriculum, Develop a Culture of High Expectations
